name: Catholic Charities Boston
description: Offers adult education and workforce development programs, including job training for IT support specialists and certified nursing assistants/home health aides. They also provide ESOL classes and High School Equivalency programs

name: Catholic Charities Worcester County
description: Provides employment, training, and job search assistance through their Senior Community Service Employment Program (SCSEP) for low-income older job seekers. Their Mercy Centre also offers employment opportunities and training programs for adults

name: Catholic Charities - Diocese of Fall River
address: 1600 Bay Street, Fall River, MA (Office); 238 Bonney Street, New Bedford, MA (Solanus Casey Food Pantry)
description: Offers employment services, case management, and various other support programs for individuals and families in Southeastern Massachusetts. They also run a food drive to support those in need

name: Catholic Charities North Youthworks program
address: 117 N. Common Street, Lynn, MA (Program location)
description: This program helps out-of-school youth prepare for High School Equivalency exams and offers various workforce development services, including occupational skills training and paid/unpaid work experiences
